API Docs for Sandy 3D Engine haXe Port, ver. 3.1.2

sandy.materials.attributes.MaterialAttributes

type
class
version
3.1
The MaterialAttributes class is used to apply one or more attributes to a Shape3D object.

Constructor

new(?args : Array<T>)
Creates a new LightAttributes object.

Instance Variables

attributes : Array<IAttributes>

List of attributes.

flags(__getFlags,null) : Int

Returns flags for attributes.

Instance Methods

begin(p_oScene : sandy.core.Scene3D) : Void

parameters
p_oScene The scene.
see
#finish()
sandy.core.Scene3D
Method called before the display list rendering. This is the common place for this attribute to precompute things.

draw(p_oGraphics : flash.display.Graphics, p_oPolygon : sandy.core.data.Polygon, p_oMaterial : sandy.materials.Material, p_oScene : sandy.core.Scene3D) : Void

parameters
p_oGraphics The Graphics object to draw attributes to.
p_oPolygon The polygon which is going to be drawn.
p_oMaterial The refering material.
p_oScene The scene.
see
sandy.core.data.Polygon
sandy.materials.Material
sandy.core.Scene3D
Draws all attributes to the graphics object.

drawOnSprite(p_oSprite : sandy.core.scenegraph.Sprite2D, p_oMaterial : sandy.materials.Material, p_oScene : sandy.core.Scene3D) : Void

parameters
p_oSprite The Sprite2D object to draw attributes to.
p_oMaterial The refering material.
p_oScene The scene.
see
sandy.core.scenegraph.Sprite2D
sandy.materials.Material
sandy.core.Scene3D
Applies attributes to a sprite.

finish(p_oScene : sandy.core.Scene3D) : Void

parameters
p_oScene The scene.
see
#begin()
sandy.core.Scene3D
Method called right after the display list rendering. This is the place to remove and dispose memory if necessary.

init(p_oPolygon : sandy.core.data.Polygon) : Void

parameters
p_oPolygon The polygon.
see
#unlink()
sandy.core.data.Polygon
Allows all attributes to proceed to an initialization to know when the polyon isn't lined to the material.

unlink(p_oPolygon : sandy.core.data.Polygon) : Void

parameters
p_oPolygon The polygon.
see
#init()
sandy.core.data.Polygon
Remove all initializations (opposite of init method) from all attributes.
